title: Ann Pettifor: How Do We Create the Financial Conditions for a Green New Deal?
itunes:title: Ann Pettifor: How Do We Create the Financial Conditions for a Green New Deal?
description: Political economist, author, and public speaker Ann Pettifor talks about her latest book, The Case for a Green New Deal, which not only lays out the urgency for such a deal, but also proposes a roadmap for both national and global financial reform to make it possible.
